text: i yud'dhamutal avarkku sesam vannettiyavarkkumullatan. avar innane prarthikkunnavaran: "nannalute natha, ni nannalkkum nannalute mumpe satyavisvasam svikaricca nannalute saheadarannalkkum pearuttutarename! nannalute manas'sukalil visvasikaleat ottum verupp untakkarute. nannalute natha! urappayum ni dayaparanum paramakarunikanumallea.â€
